qrList.label: userprocess
qrList.message:
/run blanche.getinput |
/if left=userinput right=1 rule=eq "/getvar newdesc1 \| /setvar key=newdesc \| /run blanche.addcommand" |
/if left=userinput right=2 rule=eq "/getvar newdesc2 \| /setvar key=newdesc \| /run blanche.addcommand" |
/if left=userinput right=3 rule=eq "/getvar newdesc3 \| /setvar key=newdesc \| /run blanche.addcommand"

qrList.label: Send
qrList.message:
/run blanche.userprocess |
/if left=blocktrigger right=true rule=eq else="/send {{input}}{{newline}}{{pipe}} \| /trigger" "/setvar key=blocktrigger false" | /flushvar nadanada | /setinput

qrList.label: getaioutput
qrList.message:
/delay 50 |
/setvar key=tomsgprocess {{lastMessage}} |
/setvar key=startregex (?<=```[\S\s]+)1\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \n2\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=newdesc1 |

/setvar key=tomsgprocess {{lastMessage}} |
/setvar key=startregex (?<=```[\S\s]+)2\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \n3\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=newdesc2 |

/setvar key=tomsgprocess {{lastMessage}} |
/setvar key=startregex (?<=```[\S\s]+)3\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \n(?<=3\s?[:\-\.][\S\s]+)``` |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=newdesc3 |

/setvar key=varname newdesc3 |
/run creamsan.isvardefined |
/if left={{pipe}} right=true rule=eq "/echo Input the number you'd like to become part of her identity."

qrList.label: addcommand
qrList.message:
/setvar key=varname newdesc |
/run creamsan.isvardefined |
/if left={{pipe}} right=true rule=eq else="/echo Not yet" "/getentryfield file=Blanche field=content 0 \| /setvar key=desc \| /addvar key=desc , {{getvar::newdesc}} \| /setentryfield file=Blanche uid=0 field=content \| /echo Added: {{getvar::newdesc}} \| /flushvar newdesc \| /flushvar newdesc1 \| /flushvar newdesc2 \| /flushvar newdesc3" |
/setvar key=blocktrigger true
